---
id: list-types
title: "List types"
description: "This endpoint retrieves a paginated list of object types (e.g. 'Page', 'Note', 'Task') available within the specified space. Each typeâ€™s record includes its unique identifier, type key, display name, icon, and a recommended layout. While a type's id is truly unique, a type's key can be the same across spaces for known types, e.g. 'ot-page' for 'Page'. Clients use this information when offering choices for object creation or for filtering objects by type through search."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves a paginated list of object types (e.g. 'Page', 'Note', 'Task') available within the specified space. Each typeâ€™s record includes its unique identifier, type key, display name, icon, and a recommended layout. While a type's id is truly unique, a type's key can be the same across spaces for known types, e.g. 'ot-page' for 'Page'. Clients use this information when offering choices for object creation or for filtering objects by type through search.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Space ID","in":"path","name":"space_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set","in":"query","name":"offset","schema":{"default":0,"type":"integer"}},{"description":"The number of items to return","in":"query","name":"limit","schema":{"default":100,"maximum":1000,"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}

type","example":"todo","type":"string"},"type_key":{"description":"The key of the type (can be the same across spaces for known response","properties":{"has_more":{"description":"Indicates if there are more items available beyond the current result set","example":true,"type":"boolean"},"limit":{"description":"The maximum number of items returned in the result set","example":100,"type":"integer"},"offset":{"description":"The number of items skipped before starting to collect the result
